scripts.dev:worker: npm run build:web && npm run -w transittrack-worker dev
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run -w transittrack-worker db:migrate && npm run -w transittrack-worker deploy
